articles.content: Matts Monday Musings: A series with no rhyme or reason just consistent thoughts on all things Real Madrid released every Monday. Some weeks may be long form, others just short anecdotal thoughts. Eit… [+6440 chars]

articles.title: 'Sainz engine failure could make Ferrari's life easier' - PlanetF1
articles.description: Could Ferrari impose team orders after Carlos Sainz missed out on a podium finish in Austria due to an engine failure?
articles.content:
Carlos Sainz’s engine failure in Austria could mean a difficult decision becomes easier to make for Ferrari in the second half of the season.
